name: Kodomo in the Electric Forest
description:
Kodomo is the titular character. On his way home from school, he is followed by a trio of bullies who chase him into the Dark Woods, an isolated part of town that is said to be a scary, slimy, and spooky place. Rumor has it that whoever goes into the Dark Woods, doesn’t come out…

Kodomo succeeds in running from his bullies, but falls into a portal. When he comes to, he finds himself in the Electric Forest, a magical and welcoming fantasy land that can take him home.
